component.name: getOrder
component.description: Retrieve details of an order identified by the provided order ID.

component.name: listOrders
component.description: Retrieve a list of orders from Printavo account.

component.name: updateOrder
component.description: Update details of the order identified by the provided order ID.

component.name: deleteOrder
component.description: Delete the order identified by the provided order ID from Printavo account.

component.name: createOrder
component.description: Create a new order in Printavo account using the provided Parameters.
